description:
Lang configuration for the series main summary. Each series type has two modes:

  1. This series type is the only series type used in the chart

  2. This is a combination chart with multiple series types

If a definition does not exist for the specific series type and mode, the 'default' lang definitions are used.

children.name: bar
children.default: {name}, bar series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bars, bar)}.

children.name: barCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Bar series with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bars, bar)}.

children.name: boxplot
children.default: {name}, boxplot {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, boxes, box)}.

children.name: boxplotCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Boxplot with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, boxes, box)}.

children.name: bubble
children.default: {name}, bubble series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bubbles, bubble)}.

children.name: bubbleCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Bubble series with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bubbles, bubble)}.

children.name: column
children.default: {name}, bar series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bars, bar)}.

children.name: columnCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Bar series with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bars, bar)}.

children.name: default
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: defaultCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: line
children.default: {name}, line {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: lineCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Line with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: map
children.default: {name}, map {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, areas, area)}.

children.name: mapbubble
children.default: {name}, bubble series {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bubbles, bubble)}.

children.name: mapbubbleCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Bubble series with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, bubbles, bubble)}.

children.name: mapCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Map with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, areas, area)}.

children.name: mapline
children.default: {name}, line {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: maplineCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Line with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: pie
children.default: {name}, pie {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, slices, slice)}.

children.name: pieCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Pie with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, slices, slice)}.

children.name: scatter
children.default: {name}, scatter plot {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: scatterCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}, scatter plot with {numPoints} {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: spline
children.default: {name}, line {ix} of {numSeries} with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.

children.name: splineCombination
children.default: {name}, series {ix} of {numSeries}. Line with {numPoints} data {#plural(numPoints, points, point)}.
